metadata.description: Reference data for Digimon attributes including Factions/Families, Types/Races, and Traits

factions.name: Nature Spirits
factions.description: Digimon that embody the forces of nature and natural elements.

factions.name: Dragon Roar
factions.description: Digimon with dragon lineage and powerful draconic abilities.

factions.name: Metal Empire
factions.description: Mechanical and metallic Digimon with advanced technology.

factions.name: Virus Busters
factions.description: Digimon dedicated to fighting against viral threats and corruption.

factions.name: Jungle Trooper
factions.description: Digimon that thrive in wild environments and possess primal strength.

factions.name: Deep Savers
factions.description: Aquatic Digimon that protect the oceans and water realms.

factions.name: Nightmare Soldiers
factions.description: Dark Digimon that wield the power of nightmares and shadows.

factions.name: Wind Guardians
factions.description: Aerial Digimon that control wind and sky domains.

types.name: Virus
types.description: Malicious Digimon that spread corruption and seek to destroy.

types.name: Vaccine
types.description: Benevolent Digimon that protect the Digital World and fight viruses.

types.name: Data
types.description: Neutral Digimon that don't align with virus or vaccine factions.

traits.name: Bruiser
traits.description: Tangguh dan tetap memukul keras‚Äîmenggabungkan ketahanan tinggi (HP/DEF/Shield) dengan output damage yang signifikan.

traits.name: AoE
traits.description: Spesialis serangan area yang mengenai banyak target sekaligus untuk meratakan HP musuh secara kolektif.

traits.name: DPS
traits.description: Penghasil damage murni yang tinggi‚Äîsumber damage bukan dari ketahanan (HP/DEF/Shield), melainkan dari serangan langsung.

traits.name: Tank
traits.description: Penyerap serangan utama dengan HP besar, DEF tinggi, Shield kuat, atau kombinasinya. Fokus bertahan, bukan membalas.

traits.name: Support
traits.description: Tidak fokus damage atau ketahanan; tugasnya membantu tim‚Äîhealing, menaikkan speed, memberi buff, dan/atau memasang debuff utilitas.

traits.name: Single Target
traits.description: Eksekutor satu sasaran‚Äîskill berfokus pada 1 target untuk menghabisi unit prioritas.

traits.name: Control
traits.description: Pemberi crowd control seperti stun, freeze, charm, petrify, slow, dan bentuk kontrol lain untuk membatasi aksi lawan.

traits.name: Buff
traits.description: Memberikan penguatan pada tim: ATK/DEF/Speed/Crit/Shield atau efek positif lain untuk menaikkan performa.

traits.name: Debuff
traits.description: Melemahkan musuh melalui efek negatif seperti reduce DEF/ATK/Speed, weaken, dan debuff kontrol lainnya.

traits.name: Cleanser
traits.description: Menghapus efek buruk (debuff/CC) dari tim sendiri agar komposisi tetap aktif dan stabil.

traits.name: Buff Breaker
traits.description: Menghapus efek baik (buff) pada musuh‚Äîkonter efektif untuk tim bertahan atau tim yang mengandalkan penguatan masif.

traits.name: Healer
traits.description: Pemulih HP tim‚Äîmelalui heal langsung, heal bertahap, atau efek pemulihan lain‚Äîuntuk menjaga ketahanan tim sepanjang pertempuran.

traits.name: Reviver
traits.description: Menghidupkan kembali rekan tim yang gugur, bisa dengan sebagian HP, full HP, atau memberi status revive; krusial untuk membalik keadaan.

traits.name: Poison
traits.description: Damage berkelanjutan sebesar 5% Max HP target per turn (dibatasi hingga 200% Attack Power pemberi efek).

traits.name: Burn
traits.description: Damage berkelanjutan sebesar 10% ATK milik pemberi efek Burn‚Äîskala dengan serangan caster.

traits.name: Bleed
traits.description: Damage berkelanjutan sebesar 8% setiap turn berdasarkan Current HP target (semakin tinggi HP saat ini, semakin besar damage).

tickets.name: Summon Ticket
tickets.description: To obtain up to Perfect stage Digimon and Common Soul Stone.

tickets.name: Event Ticket
tickets.description: To obtain up to Perfect stage Digimon, Rare and Limited Soul Stone.

soulStoneFragments.craftRule: Collect 60 same Fragments to craft 1 Soul Stone.

coreCode.craftRule: Collect 30 same stage Core Code to summon 1 Digimon within that stage.

sets4.name: Ancient Set
sets4.effect: After entering battle, maximum HP increases by 15%.

sets4.name: Divine Corrosion Set
sets4.effect: At the start of each turn, gain 1 stack of [Aozhan] (damage increase 3%). Max 10 stacks.

sets4.name: Time-Space Set
sets4.effect: 10% chance to inflict Petrify on the target for 1 turn with each active attack.

sets4.name: Martial Set
sets4.effect: For every 100 Speed points, gain 0.4% Damage Increase (capped at 20%).

sets4.name: Izumi Set
sets4.effect: For every 100 Speed points, gain 0.4% Damage Reduction (capped at 20%).

sets4.name: Destiny Set
sets4.effect: After taking the first attack, gain a shield equal to 25% of maximum HP, lasting for 2 turns.

sets4.name: Crescent Set
sets4.effect: 10% chance to inflict Freeze on the target for 1 turn when taking direct damage.

uniqueCores.name: Overclocking Core
uniqueCores.effect: After dealing damage, own ATK increases by 2%; stacks up to 8 layers.

uniqueCores.name: Combat Readiness Core
uniqueCores.effect: On self turns, Effect Hit +15%, Effect Resistance +15%.

uniqueCores.name: Resistance Core
uniqueCores.effect: When ally removes a debuff, they gain 25% Status Effect Resistance for 2 turns.

uniqueCores.name: Breaking Shield Core
uniqueCores.effect: When attacking a target with a Shield status, damage is increased by 12%.

concentratePotion.name: Concentrate Potion
concentratePotion.description: Potion to skip the battle in the Digital World.

offLimits.description: Items to off-limit potential (increase potential caps).

sourceCodeMark.name: Source Code Mark
sourceCodeMark.description: To upgrade the mark of the Digimon.

wondrousCrystal.name: Wondrous Crystal
wondrousCrystal.description: Maximize Individual Value (IV) with a maximum value of 31 points; also strengthens ATK, HP, DEF, and SPD.
